analysis.description: LockedSecretChallenge.initChallenge (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#101-103) is never initialized. It is used in:

LockedSecretChallenge.transferFinal (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#134-164) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#163-164)

LockedSecretChallenge.emergency (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#166-170) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-pecul.transfer(owner,pecul.balanceOf(this)) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#168-169)

Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#386-403) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#396-399)

LockedSecretChallenge.transferFinal has external calls inside a loop:
	- pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#163-164)

Reentrancy in LockedSecretChallenge.InitPeculiumAdress (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#115-124):
	External calls:
	- decimals = pecul.decimals() (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#122)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initPecul (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#122)

Reentrancy in Peculium.UpgradeTokens (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#386-403):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(peculOld.totalSupply() > 0) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#391)
	- amountChanged = peculOld.allowance(msg.sender,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#391-396)
	- peculOld.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#396-399)
	- peculOld.burn(amountChanged) (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#399)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#399-400)
	- balances (/unique_chucks/37/0x7e924bf596468c000a031c958b032dcefd39ac5c.sol#400-401)
